name: Peppermint Mocha Cookies
author: Watercat
summary: A cookie that tastes like a holiday drink. These are soft in the middle with a little crunch on top.
ingredients: ⅓ cup unsweetened cocoa powder (such as Hershey's Special Dark)
½ cup crushed peppermint candy canes
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line 4 baking sheets with parchment paper
Whisk flour, cocoa, espresso, and salt together in a bowl
Cream butter and sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until pale and fluffy
Add egg and vanilla extract; beat to combine
Add flour mixture and beat on low speed until well combined
Dip the tops of the cookies into the crushed candy canes
Place candy-side up on the prepared baking sheets, about 1 inch apart
Bake in the preheated oven until firm, 14 to 16 minutes
Transfer to a wire rack to cool
